preview.title: In one of the most authentic and beautiful islands of Guadeloupe, in the heart of the Caribbean
preview.subtitle: Come and take the time to discover the authentic charms of Marie-Galante, its inhabitants and the Caribbean culture
preview.description: The authenticity of life in the Caribbean, a picturesque charm and countless white sandy beaches

discover.title: Discover the island
discover.description: Discover ¬´ la galette ¬ª (nickname of the island), its white sandy beaches with turquoise waters, its aquatic fauna, tropical forests, mangroves, hiking trails, gastronomy, three rum distilleries, and mills...

essentials.photo_title: Inspired by our story, in the heart of nature to offer a different life experience.
essentials.title: DISCOVER THE SERVICES WE OFFER
essentials.subtitle: The essentials for a cozy and comfortable stay
essentials.airport_description: We can pick you up at the aerodrome or at the ferry arrival.
essentials.stuff_description: Sun loungers available for moments of relaxation.
essentials.pool_description: Directly in the garden, in front of your terrace.
essentials.rhum_description: Come discover the cocktails and rums of the island. Available on request.

room.closed: CLOSED from October 1st to November 30th, 2024 for renovations. Starting December 1st, the pool will be in front of your terrace and the accommodation will be air-conditioned.
room.description_1: In a setting of lush greenery, our Ti' Dola Sab cottage is a fully independent wooden house, recently built with all the necessary comfort.
room.description_2_2: awaits you for your moments of relaxation, shaded by a magnificent fragrant Ylang Ylang tree. Your cottage faces the state forest, a calm and peaceful green haven for nature lovers.
room.description_3: All you have to do is enjoy magical moments.
room.description_4: Our pleasure: to welcome you and share our paradise. A welcome basket awaits you upon your arrival (from 2 PM and check-out until 11 AM).
room.access_description: We are very well located to visit and explore the island with our central location. The three major towns, Grand-Bourg, Capesterre, and St Louis, are 10 minutes from Ti' Dola Sab. For shopping, it's a 2-minute walk to Morne Lolo. One of the three distilleries is 2 minutes by car.
room.beaches: The most beautiful beaches on the island are 10 minutes away:

booking.prices_text: per night. One half-day offered per week. Tourist tax of 2‚Ç¨ per night per adult.
booking.conditions: The rental agreement will be sent to you with a request for a deposit of 50% (via bank transfer) to confirm your booking. The balance will be requested 14 days before arrival.
booking.christmas: Minimum stay of 2 nights (4 for the Christmas/New Year period).

history.title: Meet the team
history.subtitle: Who are we?
history.description_1: Discovering Marie-Galante was a true love at first sight for us.
history.description_2: After numerous trips to this magnificent island that adopted us, we decided to settle down permanently. Our greatest pleasure is to share it with you.
history.description_3: Our greatest pleasure is to share it with you.

activities.title: Set off to discover and ...
activities.subtitle: Write your story
activities.description: By exploring its white sandy beaches with turquoise waters, its aquatic fauna, tropical forests, mangroves, hiking trails, gastronomy, its three rum distilleries, its mills...
activities.sub_description: Take the time to appreciate the authentic charms of Marie-Galante, its inhabitants, and its Caribbean culture.

activity_1.title: Beaches
activity_1.description: Discover its crystal-clear waters and fine sand.

activity_2.title: Rum Distilleries
activity_2.description: Explore the three distilleries of Marie-Galante and learn more about the production and tasting of its various rums.

activity_3.title: Caye Plate
activity_3.description: Of rare beauty and vertiginous, the Caye Plate cliff.

activity_4.title: √élet de Vieux Fort
activity_4.description: Explore the mangrove of Vieux Fort, its beach, and also enjoy a hike in exceptional landscapes!

activity_5.title: Habitation Roussel Trianon
activity_5.description: Discover the history of the Habitation Roussel Trianon, an old sugar factory, and admire the Creole architecture of the island.

activity_6.title: Water Activities
activity_6.description: Try diving or snorkeling and explore the island's underwater fauna and flora.

activity_7.title: Street Art
activity_7.description: A true celebration of local culture, art, and creativity.

activity_8.title: Gueule Grand Gouffre
activity_8.description: A natural arch carved by the sea and a breathtaking viewpoint.

activity_9.title: Habitation Murat
activity_9.description: Remnants of a sugar plantation and museum.

photos.title: OUR MOST BEAUTIFUL SHOTS
photos.subtitle: Discover the paradise that awaits you
photos.description: Whether on the beach or inland, every moment is unique in Marie-Galante.
photos.sub_description: Here is a glimpse of what you can observe during your stay with us.
